Hodrick-Prescot Filter

Source: R/07-filter.R
filter_hp.Rd

This function computes the cyclical component of the Hodrick-Prescot filter.

filter_hp(x, ...)

Arguments

x

[univariate vector]

Univariate vector, numeric or ts object with only one dimension.
...

Further arguments passed to hpfilter.

See also

select_lambda

Examples

# \donttest{
x <- cumsum(rnorm(100))
filter_hp(x)

#>   [1]  1.67956966  0.60742292  0.06812960  0.13226389  0.89198466 -0.67504276

select_lambda("monthly")

#> [1] 14400
filter_hp(x, freq = 100)
